content: 12.  Load sharing strategies prioritize certain areas or sectors to prevent over
type=decision No pre-commit hooks. The test suite runs in CI only. Local commits
type=note Rebasing is preferred over merge commits for keeping history linear. I
type=decision Commit messages use a tool-name prefix followed by a colon: crib:
type=decision book uses a SQLite task queue rather than Redis or a message broke
type=decision Each tool repo uses a single main branch with no feature branches.
type=note Git tags are not used for versioning. Tools are pinned by commit hash
type=decision Log messages are sentences, not codes. stored entry #42 (decision)
type=decision The system does not use a message bus. Tools communicate through f
type=note Spill provides three severity levels: info, warn, error. There is no d
